author: Alvin Buyinza
title: Unresponsive child who was hospitalized in Mass. died, DA says - NewsBreak
text:
MassLive.com
website
Boston
Unresponsive child who was hospitalized in Mass. died, DA says
By Alvin Buyinza,
26 minutes agoA child who was hospitalized Thursday afternoon after they were found unresponsive has died, officials said. The child had no signs of trauma, according to James Borghesani, a spokesperson for the Suffolk County District Attorney‚Äôs Office. They died around 3 p.m. Authorities did not state the child‚Äôs age, name...

author: VNExplorer
title: Pour sauver plus d'enfants, "nous avons besoin de dons d‚Äôorganes p√©diatriques"
text:
Pour sauver plus d‚Äôenfants, ‚Äúnous avons besoin de dons d‚Äôorganes p√©diatriques‚Äù
√Ä l‚Äôoccasion de la sortie du film de Karim Dridi ‚ÄúRevivre‚Äù, l‚ÄôAgence de la biom√©decine rappelle dans un communiqu√© de presse ‚Äúles besoins de dons d‚Äôorganes p√©diatriques pour les jeunes patients‚Äù.
‚ÄúLe nombre de donneurs d‚Äôorganes p√©diatriques est en diminution de 31 %‚Äù ‚ÄúEn France, de nombreux b√©b√©s et de nombreux jeunes enfants sont en attente d‚Äôune greffe, mais le nombre de donneurs d‚Äôorganes p√©diatriques est en diminution de 31 % depuis 2018‚Äù, pr√©cise l‚Äôorganisation. ‚ÄúCette baisse pose la double question du niveau d‚Äôinformation et du taux d‚Äôopposition parentale au pr√©l√®vement‚Äù ajoute-t-elle.
‚ÄúEn effet, dans le cadre du don p√©diatrique, il faut obtenir le consentement explicite des deux titulaires de l‚Äôautorit√© parentale‚Äù, pr√©cisent les sp√©cialistes. ‚ÄúLe taux d‚Äôopposition p√©diatrique atteint 47 % en 2023, contre 30 % en 2011. Ce taux reste sup√©rieur au taux d‚Äôopposition moyen observ√© chez l‚Äôadulte (36 % en 2023)‚Äù, d√©plorent-ils.
En 2023, 18 enfants sont d√©c√©d√©s faute de greffon compatible La greffe d‚Äôorganes chez les enfants n√©cessite la disponibilit√© d‚Äôorganes de taille adapt√©e √† leur morphologie, et les familles doivent d√©cider en un temps tr√®s court si leur enfant d√©c√©d√© peut √™tre un potentiel donneur. Au cours de l‚Äôann√©e derni√®re, la France a enregistr√© 48 donneurs p√©diatriques (dont 13 avaient moins de 5 ans) et 260 nouveaux jeunes patients inscrits en attente d‚Äôune greffe (dont 118 pour le foie, 111 pour le rein et 25 pour le c≈ìur).
Les enfants sont toujours prioritaires sur les adultes quand un organe est disponible et adapt√© √† leur morphologie, mais la m√©diane d‚Äôattente reste encore trop longue : ‚Äì 11,1 mois pour le rein, ‚Äì 2,1 mois pour le foie, ‚Äì 2 mois pour le c≈ìur. En 2023, 18 enfants sont d√©c√©d√©s faute de greffon compatible.

author: Lewis Dortch
title: Weather Forecast: Snow, rain, sleet and freezing rain Friday
text:
MISSOULA ‚Äî An impactful winter storm will move in Friday bringing heavy snow to mountains and northwest Montana.
Arctic air will move from east to west across the divide into northwest Montana today. At the same time, this cold air will interact with a storm system from the Pacific Ocean. The combination of these two systems will result in heavy snow for the northwest part of the state. The heaviest snow will fall from the Flathead Valley and east where winter storm warnings have been issued (see above graphs for snow totals.).
As you head south snow amounts will drop quickly as the arctic air is not expected to make it this far, this means rain will begin to mix with snow by Friday late morning or afternoon.
By late afternoon and evening, models show freezing rain developing for areas around the Mission Valley and south. Under these conditions roads may quickly freeze over leading to very difficult travel for tonight into Saturday morning.
Mountains during this time will experience off and on heavy snow with the heaviest snow impacting Lookout and Marias Passes (again see above graph for pass totals).
By the weekend, warmer air will move into all of western Montana keeping snow showers in the mountains and rain or rain/snow in the valleys.

author: Harper Wright
title: La NFL fait un saut audacieux dans l'√®re num√©rique, se dirigeant vers un avenir sans les cha√Ænes de mesure, et r√©volutionnant la mesure des distances dans un mouvement historique.
text:
Adopter les avanc√©es technologiques
La NFL, bastion de la tradition et de l‚Äôhistoire, fait d√©sormais un pas audacieux vers l‚Äô√®re num√©rique, signalant un changement significatif dans la fa√ßon dont le jeu est jou√© et arbitr√©. La d√©cision de la ligue d‚Äôadopter des technologies de pointe pourrait potentiellement rendre l‚Äôembl√©matique cha√Æne de mesure obsol√®te, marquant un moment historique dans l‚Äô√©volution du football am√©ricain.
Dans un sport o√π chaque pouce compte, la m√©thode traditionnelle de mesure des downs et des distances √† l‚Äôaide de deux b√¢tons reli√©s par une cha√Æne est rest√©e un pilier depuis ses d√©buts dans les ann√©es 1890. Cependant, alors que la NFL progresse vers la modernisation, cette pratique ancestrale est d√©sormais confront√©e √† la perspective d‚Äô√™tre remplac√©e par des syst√®mes √©lectroniques promettant une plus grande pr√©cision et efficacit√©.
Un aper√ßu du pass√©
La vue des arbitres √©tirant m√©ticuleusement la cha√Æne pour d√©terminer si une √©quipe a r√©ussi un premier down a longtemps √©t√© une sc√®ne famili√®re sur les terrains de football √† travers le pays. Cette pratique v√©n√©r√©e, empreinte de tradition et de nostalgie, a √©t√© une partie int√©grante du tissu du jeu pendant bien plus d‚Äôun si√®cle.
Alors que les fans et les joueurs se sont habitu√©s au suspense et au drame qui accompagnent chaque mesure, la cha√Æne de mesure est devenue un symbole de la riche histoire du football et de son h√©ritage durable. Pourtant, alors que la NFL se tourne vers l‚Äôavenir, elle est pr√™te √† dire adieu √† ce dispositif embl√©matique au profit de technologies plus avanc√©es et fiables.
R√©volutionner la mesure de distance
La d√©cision d‚Äôintroduire des syst√®mes √©lectroniques pour mesurer les premiers downs repr√©sente un changement monumental dans la fa√ßon dont le jeu est arbitr√© et v√©cu. En tirant parti de technologies de pointe, la NFL vise √† rationaliser le processus de d√©termination du down et de la distance, offrant une plus grande pr√©cision et efficacit√© sur le terrain.
Avec des syst√®mes √©lectroniques pr√™ts √† r√©volutionner la mesure des distances, la ligue n‚Äôadopte pas seulement l‚Äôinnovation, mais √©tablit √©galement une nouvelle norme de pr√©cision et de fiabilit√© dans l‚Äôarbitrage du football. Ce mouvement r√©volutionnaire signale un changement sismique dans la mani√®re dont le jeu est jou√© et arbitr√©, ouvrant la voie √† un avenir o√π la cha√Æne de mesure pourrait devenir une relique du pass√©.

author: Lance!
title: Em noite hist√≥rica de Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal estreia com vit√≥ria na Liga das Na√ß√µes - Lance!
text: Em noite hist√≥rica de Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal estreia com vit√≥ria na Liga das Na√ß√µes Jogo marcou o gol de n√∫mero 900 de Cristiano Ronaldo na carreira [Lance!](https://www.lance.com.br/autor/lance-2-2-2) Portugal estreou na Liga das Na√ß√µes com um grande resultado no Est√°dio da Luz. Em jogo marcado pelo gol de n√∫mero 900 de [Cristiano Ronaldo](https://www.lance.com.br/futebol-internacional) e homenagens ao rec√©m aposentado Pepe, a sele√ß√£o lusitana bateu a Cro√°cia de [Modric](https://www.lance.com.br/futebol-internacional) por 2 a 1 na primeira rodada do Grupo 1 da competi√ß√£o. Al√©m do camisa sete, Diogo Dalot foi autor dos outros dois gols do jogo, um a favor e outro contra. ‚û°Ô∏è [Tudo sobre os maiores times e as grandes estrelas do futebol no mundo afora agora no WhatsApp. Siga o nosso canal Lance! Futebol Internacional](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaaOuJF7tkjEHLyEnm21) Antes do jogo, o rec√©m aposentado Pepe foi homenageado pela torciada no Est√°dio da Luz. O ex-zagueiro ganhou um mosaico especial, al√©m de uma camisa personalizada da federa√ß√£o portuguesa. Portugal 2x1 Cro√°cia: como foi o jogo? O time de Roberto Mart√≠nez come√ßou a partida de forma impositiva e saiu na frente logo aos sete minutos, com Diogo Dalot, que surgiu como elemento surpresa na grande √°rea e aproveitou passe de Bruno Fernandes. A sele√ß√£o de Roberto Mart√≠nez seguiu no comando do jogo por meio da posse de bola e ampliou o resultado em um momento hist√≥rico: o 900¬∫ gol de Cristiano Ronaldo da carreira. Ainda no primeiro tempo, Diogo Dalot acabou marcando contra a pr√≥pria meta ap√≥s uma jogada confusa na grande √°rea portuguesa. No segundo tempo, Portugal repetiu a postura dos 45 minutos iniciais e manteve o controle do jogo, enquanto a Cro√°cia buscava o empate pelos contra-ataques, mas sem sucesso. Com o resultado, Portugal abre tr√™s pontos na lideran√ßa do Grupo 1 da Liga das Na√ß√µes. ‚úÖ FICHA T√âCNICA PORTUGAL X CRO√ÅCIA NATIONS LEAGUE - 1¬™ RODADA üóìÔ∏è Data e hor√°rio: quinta-feira, 5¬∫ de setembro de 2024, √†s 15h45 (de Bras√≠lia) üìç Local: Est√°dio da Luz, em Lisboa (POR) üì∫ Onde assistir: SporTV ‚öΩ Gols: Diogo Dalot, aos 7' e Cristiano Ronaldo (POR); Diogo Dalot (CRO) üÖ∞Ô∏è Assist√™ncias: Bruno Fernandes e Nuno Mendes (POR) Cart√µes amarelos: L. Modric (CRO) Expuls√µes: - ‚öΩ ESCALA√á√ïES PORTUGAL (T√©cnico: Roberto Mart√≠nez) Diogo Costa; Diogo Dalot, R√∫ben Dias, Inacio, Nuno Mendes; Vitinha, Bernardo Silva, Bruno Fernandes; Pedro Neto, Rafael Le√£o, Cristiano Ronaldo. CRO√ÅCIA (T√©cnico: Zlatko Dalic) Livakovic; Sosa, Sutalo, Pongracic, Gvardiol; Baturina, Luka Modric, Kovacic; Jakic, Kramaric, Pasalic. Tudo sobre

author: time news
title: The far-right Milei promotes by law up to six years in prison for promoters of social protests - timenews
text: 2023-12-28 21:25:59 The far-right Javier Milei sent this Wednesday to Congress a bill that declares the country in a ‚Äúpublic emergency‚Äù and includes 664 articles that fundamentally change a good part of the political, social and economic structure of Argentina. The omnibus law, as it is called due to its extension and variety of topics, involves the transfer to the executive branch of broad legislative powers in economic, financial, pension, fiscal, health and even electoral matters. The project, which will be discussed in extraordinary sessions by Congress, also includes a toughening of sanctions against social protest. Milei intends that any ‚Äúintentional and temporary congregation of three or more people‚Äù be considered a demonstration punishable by up to six years in prison if it impedes free movement or the provision of public services. The text sent to Congress, Milei‚Äôs most forceful political initiative since he assumed power in Argentina at the beginning of the month, warns that any demonstration must be notified in advance and the Ministry of Security may oppose or propose changes. In addition, social organizers must declare who is responsible for the calls to facilitate their identification in case they deserve criminal sanctions. The bill gives form to law to the anti-protest protocol signed two weeks ago by the Minister of Security, Patricia Bullrich. Added to the bill submitted on Wednesday are other previous actions that have increased social discontent during the first three weeks in the Casa Rosada. First, it was the decalogue of economic measures announced by the Minister of Economy, Luis Caputo, who devalued the currency by 50% and announced the elimination of subsidies for transportation and energy starting in January, among other measures. This week, the Government also annulled the contracts of at least 5,000 state employees, after signing a decree with hundreds of reforms that, according to the Executive‚Äôs reading, did not need to go through Congress. In the list of reforms proposed by the legislative project, pompously called ‚ÄúLaw of bases and starting points for the freedom of Argentines‚Äù, is the power of the Executive to privatize fifty public companies, the end of the primary elections of the parties and a restructuring of the Chamber of Deputies that makes it easier to add parliamentarians to second and third electoral forces, as is currently the government party, La Libertad Avanza. The law, if approved, intervenes on all types of issues. Free public universities, for example, will be able to charge foreign students for their training; It also promotes laundering of large fortunes that have been evading taxes for years. Milei‚Äôs proposal declares the country in a situation of ‚Äúpublic emergency‚Äù until December 31, 2025. This very long period can also be extended for another two years, which would cover the entire term of the president. It is this situation of supposed public emergency that enables the Government to assume powers that correspond to the legislative power. The Argentine Constitution prevents this transfer of powers ‚Äúexcept in specific matters of administration or public emergency, with a deadline set for its exercise and within the bases of the delegation that Congress establishes.‚Äù Call to strike The General Confederation of Workers (CGT) and the Central Workers of Argentina (CTA), the country‚Äôs main union centers, met this Thursday to evaluate the next steps against the far-right reforms. The CGT announced a strike for January 24 after noon. That day they will once again test the protest control protocol implemented to prohibit street closures. They already did it this Wednesday when more than 20,000 people, according to the organizers, staged the first demonstration of strength by the unions. It was inevitable that attendees would hit the pavement due to the size of the gathering and the mobilization ended in tension. READ Also: Unemployment: Bruno Le Maire wants to reduce the duration of compensation for those over 55 Demonstration on Wednesday in the center of Buenos Aires.Amanda Cotrim ‚ÄúSet the date! ‚ÄúSet the date!‚Äù She heard herself during this Wednesday‚Äôs rally. The demand was directed at the labor unions, to whom the protesters demanded that they call a general strike. The unions have been ‚Äúmeasuring the thermometer,‚Äù according to organizational sources told this newspaper, and defining their strategies prudently. Rodolfo Aguiar, national secretary of the State Workers Association, which is part of the CTA, assessed before the announcement of the general strike that ‚Äúthe conditions for a strike are set.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe workers expect their representatives to be able to join forces and we hope that the central leaders rise to the occasion,‚Äù urged Aguiar, who told EL PA√çS that ‚Äútime is on Milei‚Äôs side‚Äù because the decree of necessity emergency imposed by the far-right comes into force on Friday. The reform package can be stopped in Congress or in the courts, but until that happens, the measures will be laws. In addition, the omnibus law will begin to be discussed by Congress in extraordinary sessions. Protesters in the square in front of the Palace of Justice in Buenos Aires, on Wednesday.AGUSTIN MARCARIAN (REUTERS) For leftist parties and movements, the call for a strike was pressing. On Wednesday they supported the demonstration, but from another place in the square, in an independent column. ‚ÄúWe came to demand the national strike and the plan of struggle, which corresponds to the seriousness of the situation,‚Äù said Eduardo Belliboni, leader of the Polo Obrero, during the rally. For Guillermo Kane, legislator and leader of the Partido Obrero, the march was nothing more than ‚Äúsymbolic.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe need fundamental action,‚Äù demanded the politician. ‚ÄúThe CGT, which has not carried out a strike in four years, has not been playing a role in active defense of the workers,‚Äù said the legislator. Different organizations, movements and political parties have already warned that they will continue to mobilize against measures that they consider an ‚Äúavailability‚Äù of their rights. Not only in the streets. In recent weeks, different sectors ‚Äì organized and self-convened neighbors ‚Äì have held assemblies throughout the country, cacerolazos and popular pots to offer food to people who need it. The far-right government faces a long season of mobilizations and resistance, but it is also confident in the support that the polls gave it. Subscribe here to the EL PA√çS Am√©rica newsletter and receive all the key information on current events in the region. #farright #Milei #promotes #law #years #prison #promoters #social #protests

author: The Super Patch Company
title: The Super Patch Company Assembles Industry-Leading Advisory Board to Advance Wellness Technology
text: Imagine a world of better sleep and less pain, without relying on medication. The Super Patch Company takes a giant leap forward with a newly formed advisory board featuring top doctors and scientists. Their expertise will drive the development of innovative wellness patches, backed by the latest scientific breakthroughs. TORONTO, April 4, 2024 /PRNewswire-PRWeb/ -- The [Super Patch Company](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4132058-1&h=4101927432&u=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperpatch.com%2F&a=Super+Patch+Company) has announced the formation of a prestigious advisory board composed of renowned medical doctors, scientists, and physical therapists. This board will guide the company's ongoing innovation and lend further credibility to their science-backed approach to general wellness. "We are thrilled to have assembled such an esteemed group of experts from diverse fields," said Jay Dhaliwal, CEO of The Super Patch Company. "Their deep knowledge and experience will be invaluable as we continue to develop cutting-edge wellness solutions." The Advisory Board Members: - Dr. Marc H Boff: Doctor of Physical Therapy, specializing in sports performance and rehabilitation. Former Director of Sports Medicine for the Milwaukee Bucks and Head Athletic Trainer for the Chicago Bulls. - Dr. Mike Clark: Founder and CEO of Fusionetics, performance healthcare consultant to numerous professional sports teams. Founder of the National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM). - Dr. Marty Miller: With more than 30 years of experience in sports medicine, performance enhancement, and injury prevention, Marty has worked with some of the top teams and people in the MLB and PGA Tour and is a Regional Master Instructor for the NASM. - Dr. Mark Sakr: A dual board-certified physician in family and sports medicine, with the degree of Fellow of the American Academy of Family Practice. Currently serves as Head Team Physician for the University of Arizona Football. - Alexander G. Schauss, PhD, FACN, CFS: Founder, CEO and Senior Director of Research at scientific and regulatory consulting company, AIBMR Life Science Inc. Since 1978, Dr. Schauss has assisted over 500 companies in over fifty countries. He has authored over 150 peer-reviewed papers. - Dr. Ana Toker: With over two decades of experience as a surgeon, Ana also has a master's degree in microbiology with a focus on the microbiome. Her passion for overall wellness is encapsulated in her online educational program, "Gut Check" which combines her experience as a microbiologist and colorectal surgeon. A Unified Mission This advisory board will complement ongoing research conducted by Clarity Science, an international clinical research organization, to further validate the effectiveness of Super Patch products. Together, they form a powerful team ensuring The Super Patch Company remains at the forefront of drug-free wellness solutions. For example, [research](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4132058-1&h=2089263816&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superpatch.com%2Fhow-the-tech-works&a=research) by Paul Doghramji, Derek Dietze and Peter Hurwitz focused on evaluating the effectiveness of a novel haptic vibrotactile trigger technology (VTT) embedded in a non-pharmacologic, non-invasive sleep patch. The purpose was to compare the experiences of patients using the VTT-enabled sleep patch with those using a control patch without the technology. Key Findings: - Significant improvements were observed in sleep quality, duration, and insomnia severity scores among participants using the VTT-enabled sleep patch. - Patients reported reduced time to fall asleep, increased hours of sleep, and enhanced overall sleep quality after using the VTT-enabled patch. - The majority of participants expressed satisfaction with the convenience and ease of use of the VTT-enabled patch, preferring it over traditional oral medications for sleep. - Quality of life components, including daytime fatigue, mood, and cognitive function, showed notable improvement in patients using the VTT-enabled patch. - Conversely, participants using the control patch without VTT technology did not experience similar improvements in sleep quality or quality of life measures. Researchers write that this innovative technology may reduce the reliance on traditional pharmacological treatments for sleep issues. Similar studies have taken place regarding the effects of reducing pain. About The Super Patch Company [The Super Patch Company](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4132058-1&h=1153032403&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superpatch.com%2F&a=The+Super+Patch+Company) is committed to developing drug-free, technology-based solutions to support pain relief, improved sleep, and overall well-being. Using the body's natural processes, Super Patches provide a safe and effective alternative to traditional healthcare approaches. Media Contact Terry Newsome, The Super Patch Company, 1 844-550-8699, [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#0e7e7c4e7d7b7e6b7c7e6f7a6d66206d6163), [https://superpatch.com/](https://superpatch.com/) SOURCE The Super Patch Company

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Top weather events of 2023: Lack of snow
text:
Summary by Ground News On Jan. 24, several tornadoes formed in Southeast Texas. One of them prompted the National Weather Service office Houston/Galveston to declare its first Tornado Emergency. Nearly 700 homes were damaged, with more than 400 of these homes sustaining major damage. The tornado, rated an EF-3, had a path length of 18.7 miles, an estimated maximum peak wind of 140 mph. author: Dragstat
title: #315 Un juez decide desahuciar a una familia vulnerable con un hijo menor en Madrid ‚Äúa pesar de que el casero tiene 27 viviendas‚Äù
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#306](c306#c-306) Los impagos se reclaman v√≠a judicial. Sean de alquiler o sean de lo que sea. El tema de la 'ocupaci√≥n' (que no es tal), si no el 'desalojo' es lo problem√°tico si no hay una vivienda social alternativa donde meter al moroso. El derecho a techo est√° por encima del derecho a hacer negocio, es el problema de montar tu negocio en base a servicios b√°sicos. Y s√≠, la soluci√≥n es construir viviendas p√∫blicas de alquiler, cosa que ning√∫n gobierno hace, as√≠ que muy de izquierdas no ser√°n.
[#291](c291#c-291) no el resto.
No espero que todo el mundo lo haga.
Yo estoy lo deseo sobretodo por ego√≠smo. No quiero trabajar con gente que ponga trabas para tener una vida f√°cil en el trabajo y que " no les mare√©".
Los que cambian el mundo para mejor quieren cambiar las cosas no solo que les paguen bien.
Obviamente, en este sistema en el que estamos, quiero que me paguen bien por mi trabajo. Pero, fijate, para eso lo que hago es elegir trabajar en la industria que me pague m√°s, no en la que creo que podr√≠a hacer mejores cosas.
Ves lo de digo?
[#156](c156#c-156) Se presupone que alguien con 27 viviendas tiene dinero suficiente para hacer los arreglos pertinentes. El t√≠o simplemente es un jeta y un aprovechado. A m√≠ no me da ninguna pena que le salgan inquilinos morosos a este tipo de gente.
[#244](c244#c-244) ". ¬øQui√©n va a construirte una red de carreteras, una red el√©ctrica, o un sistema de suministro de agua si vives en un chalet aislado en un pueblo y quieren cobrar?. La respuesta es nadie, el Estado tiene que facilitarlo"
Pues nadie, si has construido y no tienes servicios cerca, te aguantas, te lo pagas tu si quieres.
"porque te aseguro que las sociedades donde la gente vive en casas y no en chabolas funcionan mejor"
en donde viven en chabolas que no me he enterado? en paris?, londres? ny? berlin? madrid?
"pero no se hace porque esto es un sistema de extracci√≥n de renta de las clases bajas a los grandes inversores en vivienda."
pues juntante tu con muchos que quieran comprar, montais cooperativa, y listo, ya teneis la vivienda, que facil no?
[#314](c314#c-314) "Pues nadie, si has construido y no tienes servicios cerca, te aguantas, te lo pagas tu si quieres" --> Si has construido en suelo urbano tu ayuntamiento.
"en donde viven en chabolas que no me he enterado? en paris?, londres? ny? berlin? madrid?" --> Ahi es donde quer√≠a llegar, m√≠rate estos sitios.
Khayelitsha in Cape Town (South Africa): 400,000
Kibera in Nairobi (Kenya): 700,000
Dharavi in Mumbai (India): 1,000,000
Neza (Mexico): 1,200,000
Orangi Town in Karachi (Pakistan): 2,400,000
"pues juntante tu con muchos que quieran comprar, montais cooperativa, y listo, ya teneis la vivienda, que facil no?" --> Yo no necesito compar nada, pero soy consciente de que esto es un problema para la sociedad, y crea desigualdades. El capitalismo se aprovecha de consumidores con poder adquisitivo pero no los cuida y es capaz de destruirlo todo porque es imparable.
[#315](c315#c-315) "Khayelitsha in Cape Town (South Africa): 400,000
Kibera in Nairobi (Kenya): 700,000
Dharavi in Mumbai (India): 1,000,000
Neza (Mexico): 1,200,000
Orangi Town in Karachi (Pakistan): 2,400,000"
si, y? africa, no tienen recursos, ni dinero, ni economia moderna, y?
"Yo no necesito compar nada, pero soy consciente de que esto es un problema para la sociedad, y crea desigualdades"
esas desigualdades son inherentes, no puedes quitarlas, es matematicamente imposible, que vas a regalar las viviendas? cuantas? de donde sale el dinero? las vendes? a cuanto? que pasa si hay 10mil viviendas para 100mil personas?
"Si has construido en suelo urbano tu ayuntamiento."
pues no, los servicios se pagan si hay economia de escala, si construiste en el quinto pino te fastidias. Nadie te obligo a construir.
Que se haga cargo a quien le corresponda de la situcion de esta familia. Lo que nonpuede ser es que se pretenda que una persona regale sus propiedades para que otros vivan y se lucren(no paguen)
Tampoco puede ser que una familia sin recursos tenga tropocientos hijos como si fueran una gallina ponedora.

author: Agencia EFE
title: La SIP alerta del avance de autoritarismos y del crimen organizado en las Am√©ricas
text: [1](/luces/musica/pedro-suarez-vertiz-fallecio-a-los-54-anos-tras-una-larga-enfermedad-farandula-ultimas-noticia/) [Saber m√°s](https://elcomercio.pe/buenas-practicas/) / NoticiasInformaci√≥n basada en hechos y verificada de primera mano por el reportero, o reportada y verificada por fuentes expertas. | Informativo La [Sociedad Interamericana de Prensa](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/sociedad-interamericana-de-prensa/) ( [SIP](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/sociedad-interamericana-de-prensa/)) alert√≥ este jueves sobre ‚Äúel fortalecimiento de los autoritarismos‚Äù y ‚Äúel avance del [crimen organizado](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/crimen-organizado/)‚Äù como principales factores de riesgo para las libertades de prensa y de expresi√≥n en la regi√≥n. ‚ÄúEn lo personal, considero que la creciente presencia del crimen organizado constituye -dentro de un entorno particularmente adverso- el principal peligro para el ejercicio period√≠stico en las Am√©ricas, particularmente en la regi√≥n latinoamericana y del Caribe‚Äù, se√±al√≥ el presidente de la SIP, Roberto Rock. SEPA M√ÅS: [Los muertos en Gaza por la ofensiva israel√≠ superan los 21.300 y los heridos los 55.600] En un mensaje de fin de a√±o, el titular de la organizaci√≥n dijo que el balance de 2023 ‚Äúha sido francamente negativo‚Äù y que a lo anterior se suma ‚Äúla debilidad econ√≥mica de los medios ante el colapso del modelo de negocios basado en la publicidad‚Äù. ‚ÄúLa sostenibilidad de los medios encara desaf√≠os que afectan al periodismo hasta el l√≠mite de sus capacidades‚Äù, se√±al√≥ Rock, tambi√©n director del medio mexicano La Silla Rota, y quien al mismo tiempo destac√≥ que en un mundo ‚Äúparticularmente complejo, el papel de la prensa se vuelve cada vez m√°s importante‚Äù. ‚ÄúLa industria period√≠stica ha perseverado a trav√©s de pruebas, tribulaciones y profundas crisis econ√≥micas, emergiendo como un faro de referencia‚Äù, asever√≥ el presidente de esta organizaci√≥n, con sede en Miami, en el sur de Florida (EE.UU.). Para Rock, el ‚Äúdato m√°s brutal sobre la complejidad de la tarea period√≠stica‚Äù es la violencia que sufren los informadores y medios de comunicaci√≥n, como lo refleja el asesinato de 18 reporteros durante 2023, as√≠ como los secuestros, detenciones arbitrarias, agresiones, amenazas y creciente acoso judicial. El m√°ximo responsable de la SIP, que promueve la libertad de prensa y expresi√≥n en las Am√©ricas, revel√≥ que se hallan afinando una propuesta que presentar√°n al Comit√© Ejecutivo de este organismo con miras a crear una instancia que ‚Äúsistematice esfuerzos de capacitaci√≥n, prevenci√≥n y atenci√≥n al periodismo que se desempe√±a en espacios afectados por el crimen organizado‚Äù. De igual, la SIP tiene planeado mandar en el primer trimestre de 2024 misiones a Guatemala y Ecuador para que los nuevos Gobiernos en esos pa√≠ses ‚Äúse comprometan con la libertad de prensa‚Äù. Contenido GEC
